entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -15.9°C

Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 10:50 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -15.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 96.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -18.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 70 gusting to 100 this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
